room_title: Escape room "Football Fury" by Clueless Escape Rooms in Ann Arbor
review: So much fun!! Great clues and good finds! We did the Corporate Rage and while we didn't make it out, we had a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Football Fury" by Clueless Escape Rooms in Ann Arbor
review: Another great experience on our escape room tour. Had a lot of fun with this room since I'm a huge football fan. Loved the different puzzles and enjoyed the company of the game master. Thanks for having us.

room_title: Escape room "Football Fury" by Clueless Escape Rooms in Ann Arbor
review: We had sooo much fun even though we didn't get out! We did the Football Fury game for my dad's 60 birthday, the room was awesome and the updated technology they incorporated was unheard of. Definitely check this place out.
